reviews.review_msg: Pass/Fail course. Attendance not necessary as all you are required to do to pass the course is hand in all assignments (They are all very simple and can be completed within an hour or two). She is extremely nice and is a good connection to have as she works in the CMC. Not a bad thing to say about her!
She's an amazing teacher. I found her class very easy but her lectures were boring and you do not need to attend them.

Natalia sweet, kind & caring. Can't blame her for teaching a close to useless class. Lectures are not mandatory. Submit your work even if poorly done and you should pass (pass/fail class). She helped a friend pass in the last week even though he hadn't submitted 3+ assignments. She is very helpful with career/school related advice in office hours.

She's a very nice person, works in admin, talk to her there. But class is useless, graded on pass/fail, does not count for GPA. Do your assignments and don't worry about the class. Lectures are how to be a responsible university student, totally useless.
Natalia is a very nice professor. She does make an effort to make the class interesting but the class itself is quite boring
She is so nice for this 1 credit P/F course! Excellent!
